open.title: MetroFibre outage | Centurion and surrounding areas
open.description: We are investigating reports of slow speeds and high latency affecting clients in Centurion and surrounding areas on the MetroFibre network. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologise for any inconvenience that this may be causing.
